data.title: “Only person that can take over is…”: Cillian Murphy’s Road to MCU is Nigh as Marvel Reportedly Wants to Kick Kang Out of Multiverse Saga
data.meta_description: Cillian Murphy may take on the role of Doctor Doom as Marvel reportedly decided to cut off Kang the Conqueror from the Multiverse saga.
data.text:
Cillian Murphy has already gained widespread acclaim with his wide range of performances. While he is yet to take center stage in a superhero franchise, his road to Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) looks quite nigh given the upcoming reports about the franchise pulling out Kang the Conqueror’s era out of the Multiverse saga.

Advertisement

Also Read: Before Oppenheimer Fame, Cillian Murphy Was the 3rd Choice for an Underrated Apocalypse Movie That Wanted Ryan Gosling

The reports about Kang’s end in the MCU began to loom after Jonathan Majors’s case recently came up. Since he has been declared guilty in the domestic abuse case, Marvel Studios fired him as the face of the main antagonist of Phases 5 and 6. With this, Kang’s fate remains unclear in the MCU which brings an opportunity for another Marvel villain to kick in.

Advertisement

Cillian Murphy May Enter into MCU as Doctor Doom!

Also Read: “Pivot from Kang to Dr. Doom now?”: Jonathan Majors Sacked by Marvel as Fans Suspect Cillian Murphy as New Secret Wars Villain

Following the verdict that was passed on Jonathan Majors of being guilty in the domestic abuse case made by his ex-girlfriend, Grace Jabbari, Marvel Studios dropped him as the Multiverse’s main villain.

But this led many to look at the previous theories reported following the actor’s arrest in March this year. Among them was one report about the introduction of a new villain in the franchise. Many pointed out Doctor Doom for being the perfect fit to replace the time-traveling antagonist. Given that the former has already been let go by the franchise, Kang’s character is now on hold. This makes Cillian Murphy‘s name enter into the top contenders list for Dr. Doom’s role, who is also the fan-favorite for the role.

Advertisement

In an appearance on the Happy Sad Confused Podcast, Murphy addressed the possibility of playing Doctor Doom in the franchise.

He shared,

“Yeah, I mean, I’m always… It’s always about the script. So, I’ll read… If someone sends a script, I’ll read it. And you never know what turns up…”

A recent Twitter post reported about Marvel introducing a new villain for the multiverse saga. Check out the post here.

Advertisement

While the post did not mention Doom, a Variety report previously revealed that the franchise executives were planning to replace the character with Doctor Doom.

Kang the Conqueror Reportedly Won’t Be in the Center for the Multiverse Saga

Also Read: Robert Downey Jr./ Cillian Murphy As Doctor Doom In Secret Wars Is Highly Likely Following Avengers 5 Update

The Variety report suggested that Marvel Studios President, Kevin Feige along with other executives planned to replace Kang with another powerful villain, Doom in the Multiverse saga.

Advertisement

As per the report,

“At the gathering in Palm Springs, executives discussed backup plans, including pivoting to another comic book adversary, like Dr. Doom.”

The comic character’s debut rumors further gained attention when the upcoming fifth Avengers film, The Kang Dynasty is now referred to as Avengers 5. As these doubts continue to hint at Doom’s debut, fans also agree to the same.

Check out the tweets here.

Advertisement

Meanwhile, some fans still believe that Kang’s storyline can be continued if the character is recast. It is undoubtedly a simple solution as Kang’s variants can continue the plot as they don’t need to look like the Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania variant. Nonetheless, Murphy can still make his debut in MCU with Doom if the franchise strategizes things accordingly. There is still time for the fifth Avengers saga which is slated for a 2026 release on May 1st.
